ComicInfo.Series: Ash vs. the Army of Darkness
ComicInfo.Summary:
“The name is Ash, but you can call me Mr. Williams!” Ash found out the hard way that major corporations frown upon the dismemberment of Deadites on company property. Go figure! But a change in career won’t stop him from being The Chosen One! Writers Chad Bowers & Chris Sims and artist Mauro Vargas put Ash Williams exactly where we need him…in the public school system!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Tyler Kirkham | 1 | B | Cover B | Reilly Brown | 2 | C | Cover C | Mauro Vargas | 3 | D | Cover D | Pasquale Qualano | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Tyler Kirkham | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Reilly Brown | 6 | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Pasquale Qualano | 7 | H/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Mauro Vargas | 8 | I/Auth | Authentix Variant Cover | None | 9 | J/LE | Remark Edition Variant Cover | Ken Haeser | 10 | *Notes:* Cover C and the 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover are homages of the cover of Superman #75.
